title: UX Researcher Manager
qualified: Take strategic problem areas and formulate an appropriate research strategy

Open-ended show me how you use it interviews with customers and prospects

Establish and manage relationships with research related vendors.
4+ years conducting user research for software/web-based products with stories to share
Prior experience and ability to perform all research-related tasks in the research project lifecycle with minimal help or oversight
Flexible approach to research: Our goal is to provide value to the product team. If an existing research method doesn't do that, we invent our own research method.
Experience with remote testing tools
Ability to quickly share research results with teams (top-line results in hours, not weeks).
